<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> <[[https://www.flyingmag.com/bendixking-introduces-xvue-touch-display-for-experimental-market]]> Dear Customers,
The xVue Touch <[[https://bendixking.com/en/products/xvue-touch]]> is a low cost, high performance flight display for experimental aircraft. It comes standard with all flight indicators, industry-leading SmartView™ synthetic vision, a vertical situation display that shows flight path over terrain, and ADS-B In weather and traffic. The cutting-edge touch technology provides high touch accuracy that allows you to wear your gloves while accessing all critical functions within 2 touches or less. xVue Touch comes with built-in Wi-Fi that allows you to upload databases within 4 minutes, and software updates in less than 10 minutes.
Visit us in our BendixKing Pavilion in Oshkosh, WI, during EAA’s AirVenture event July 23rd – July 29th to learn more about xVue Touch show specials!
Register here for our free Annual Customer Appreciation Event where you can enjoy food and beverages with our team members while learning about our experimental and certified aircraft solutions.
